document.full_text: the arizona house of representatives on wednesday approved controversial legislation that would make the state the first in the nation to ban abortions conducted due to the race or gender of the fetus.
document.title: arizona house approves ban on abortions for race or gender
lines_and_colors: the arizona house of representatives on wednesday approved controversial legislation that would make the state the first in the nation to ban abortions conducted due to the race or gender of the fetus.
